bibl.title: Uniconsonantal Signs and Patterns of Change: Exploring the Orthography of the Demotic Script.
bibl.note: Aims. - Previous work. - Background. - Some propositions. - The uniconsonantal signs as a category. - Some suggestions. - Conclusions.

bibl.title: Aspects of Demotic Lexicography. Acts of an International Colloquium held in Trier, 8 November 2010

bibl.seg: W.J. Tait, Uniconsonantal Signs and Patterns of Change: Exploring the Orthography of the Demotic Script.
S.P. Vleeming (ed.), Aspects of Demotic Lexicography. Acts of an International Colloquium held in Trier, 8 November 2010 = Studia Demotica. 11 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2013) pp. 127-143.
Aims. - Previous work. - Background. - Some propositions. - The uniconsonantal signs as a category. - Some suggestions. - Conclusions.
